name: Intel Arc B850
description: Intel's flagship Battlemage GPU with 16GB GDDR7. Features XeSS 2.0 upscaling, strong ray tracing, and excellent AV1 encoding. Great for creators and gamers alike.

reviews.review_text: Intel finally nailed it. Competitive performance and drivers work.
Best AV1 encoder on the market. Streamers take note.
Great value but some games still need driver updates.
